casebody.data:
No. 10-10045. Larry Edward Hendricks, Petitioner v. Alan Wilson, Attorney General of South Carolina, et al. 564 U.S. 1024, 131 S. Ct. 3033,

180 L. Ed. 2d 855,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4709. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 390 Fed. Appx. 282.
